title: Spooky Gangplank Skin Bug Teambuilder
body:
1. Logged in
2. Selected Team Builder
3. Choose Gangplank and Spooky Gangplank Skin
4. Selected Runes/Masteries
5. Clicked "OK" to join group
6. Received error message saying"SKIN_INVALID"
7. Had to exit team builder and rejoin
8. Changed skin to standard Gangplank and was able to join no problem.

Seems there is a small bug right now where you cannot use Spooky GP in team builder. Not sure if this is the same for other skins.

replies.body:
Hey the wise janitor,

Thanks for the report! This is a larger issue that isn't directly tied to the skin. We're looking into it!
